Other Monster Games Which Followed Monster Rancher
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Non-Fiction Of Interest: Other Monster Games Which Followed Monster Rancher
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, May 23, 2002 - 01:50 pm:

I will add to this periodically. The goal here is to simply have a list of similar games. The Dragon Warrior series is not included since it started before Monster Rancher came out.

Game NameYearManufacturerPlatformDescription
Dragon Seeds1998Jaleco USAPSXraise and battle dragons
Monster Seed1998SunsoftPSXcreate & battle monsters
Jade Cocoon1999CravePSXfind cocoons for monsters in a tower where you also do battle with foes & attempt to save your village
Lil' Monster2000AgetecGameBoy Colorcapture & transform crystals into monsters to raise & battle
Jurassic Park: Park Builder2001KonamiGameBoy Advancerun a sim dinosaur park and breed dinos with DNA
Dokapon:Monster Hunter2002AIAGamesGameBoy Advanceuse your monsters to defeat enemies and conquer 8 levels


Also note that a game called "Monster Rancher" by a company called Tommo was announced for the Dreamcast system to be released in 2000. They were sued by Tecmo, and subsequntly cancelled the game. It was never released, and as far as I know, no screenshots exist.
